trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to control access to directory objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: 提供控制存取目錄物件，而不需直接管理存取控制清單 (Acl) 的能力。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> class with the specified security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>類別具有指定的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The security descriptor to be associated with the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>object.
trans-unit.target: 要與新相關聯的安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 識別套用存取規則。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元集合的匿名位元，其中的意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個規則繼承自父容器為 true。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定存取規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略傳播旗標`inheritanceFlags`設<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid access control type.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效的存取控制類型。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of objects to which the new access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 類別的新存取規則套用至的物件識別。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new access rule.
trans-unit.target: 類別可以繼承新存取規則之子物件的識別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref>這個方法會建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的存取規則來判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 相關聯這<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding an access rule might cause existing access rules in the DACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 加入存取規則可能會導致現有的存取規則要合併的 DACL。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增至系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 指定的稽核規則相關聯這<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding an audit rule might cause existing audit rules in the SACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 加入稽核規則可能會導致現有的稽核規則要合併的 SACL。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 識別要套用稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元集合的匿名位元，其中的意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個規則繼承自父容器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定稽核規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited audit rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略傳播旗標`inheritanceFlags`設<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditions for which the rule is audited.
trans-unit.target: 指定稽核規則的條件。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of objects to which the new audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 要套用新的稽核規則的物件類別的識別。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 類別可繼承新的稽核規則的子物件的識別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref>這個方法會建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the access rules associated with the specified security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之安全性識別碼相關聯的存取規則的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include access rules explicitly set for the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>加入存取規則明確設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited access rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The security identifier for which to retrieve access rules.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的存取規則的安全性識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of access rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定相關聯的存取規則的集合<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the audit rules associated with the specified security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之安全性識別碼相關聯的稽核規則的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include audit rules explicitly set for the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要包含稽核規則明確設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited audit rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The security identifier for which to retrieve audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的稽核規則的安全性識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of audit rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定相關聯的稽核規則的集合<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定的修改來判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 DACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定至系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 與此相關聯的修改套用<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the SACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 SACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除包含相同的安全性識別碼和存取遮罩，指定的存取規則的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add access control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 存取被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入存取控制規則，除了移除它們。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the access rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the access rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法移除此存取規則，並傳回`false`如果相關聯的存取規則的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除的存取規則。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有相同的安全性識別碼，這與的指定的存取規則的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 相關聯的所有存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除完全符合指定之存取規則的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯的所有存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除包含相同的安全性識別碼和存取遮罩與此系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 從指定的稽核規則相關聯的稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add audit control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 稽核移除被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入稽核控制規則，除了移除它們。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the audit rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the audit rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除稽核規則失敗，並傳回`false`如果稽核規則相關聯的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除稽核規則;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有相同的安全性識別碼與此系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 從指定的稽核規則相關聯的所有稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除完全符合指定的稽核規則從系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 與此相關聯的所有稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有存取規則的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件，並將指定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to reset.
trans-unit.target: 要重設的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有與此相關聯的指定的存取規則的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 包含相同的安全性識別碼和辨識符號的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件，並將指定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除包含相同的安全性識別碼和辨識符號與此系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 中指定的稽核規則相關聯的所有稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>物件，並將指定的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的稽核規則。
